includedAssets.title: Scylla
includedAssets.synopsis: Season four of the pressure-cooker drama. Michael seeks revenge against The Company, the shadowy group of operatives responsible for destroying his life.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Season four of the pressure-cooker drama. Michael seeks revenge against The Company.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Season four of the pressure-cooker drama. Michael seeks revenge against The Company, the shadowy group of operatives responsible for destroying his life.

includedAssets.title: Breaking And Entering
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael, Lincoln, Sara and the team work with Roland to get a copy of the data card. Meanwhile, Wyatt continues his mission to track down the brothers.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael, Lincoln, Sara and the team work with Roland to get a copy of the data card.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael, Lincoln, Sara and the team work with Roland to get a copy of the data card. Meanwhile, Wyatt continues his mission to track down the brothers.

includedAssets.title: Shut Down
includedAssets.synopsis: The hunt is on to discover the next of The Company's cards, while Mahone seeks revenge against Wyatt. Elsewhere, T-Bag takes on a new identity.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The hunt is on to discover the next of The Company's cards, while Mahone seeks revenge against Wyatt. Elsewhere, T-Bag takes on a new identity.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The hunt is on to discover the next of The Company's cards, while Mahone seeks revenge against Wyatt. Elsewhere, T-Bag takes on a new identity.

includedAssets.title: Eagles & Angels
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael and co continue to hunt for the Company's cards containing the top secret information, while Sara falls back into an old habit.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael and co continue to hunt for the Company's cards containing the top secret information, while Sara falls back into an old habit.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael and co continue to hunt for the Company's cards containing the top secret information, while Sara falls back into an old habit.

includedAssets.title: Safe & Sound
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael's search for the next of the Company's cards takes him to the Treasury Department, while T-Bag forms an uneasy alliance.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael's search for the next of the Company's cards takes him to the Treasury Department, while T-Bag forms an uneasy alliance.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael's search for the next of the Company's cards takes him to the Treasury Department, while T-Bag forms an uneasy alliance.

includedAssets.title: Blow Out
includedAssets.synopsis: A trip to the races in search of the next of the cards has potentially devastating consequences when Mahone is arrested, putting the whole gang at risk.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A trip to the races in search of the next of the cards has potentially devastating consequences.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A trip to the races in search of the next of the cards has potentially devastating consequences when Mahone is arrested, putting the whole gang at risk.

includedAssets.title: Five The Hard Way
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep7 - Five The Hard Way
includedAssets.synopsis: The hunt for the next cardholder takes Lincoln, Sucre, Sara and Roland to Las Vegas, while Michael, Mahone and Bellick stay in LA to track down T-Bag.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The hunt for the next cardholder takes Lincoln, Sucre, Sara and Roland to Las Vegas, while Michael, Mahone and Bellick stay in LA to track down T-Bag.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The hunt for the next cardholder takes Lincoln, Sucre, Sara and Roland to Las Vegas, while Michael, Mahone and Bellick stay in LA to track down T-Bag.

includedAssets.title: The Price
includedAssets.synopsis: A daring plan is hatched to secure the final card, while Michael and Don form an alliance with Gretchen. Plus, there's a traitor amongst the group.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A daring plan is hatched to secure the final card, while Michael and Don form an alliance with Gretchen. Plus, there's a traitor amongst the group.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A daring plan is hatched to secure the final card, while Michael and Don form an alliance with Gretchen. Plus, there's a traitor amongst the group.

includedAssets.title: Greatness Achieved
includedAssets.synopsis: One of the gang makes the ultimate sacrifice in a bid to reach Scylla, while, with Wyatt captured, Mahone reaps revenge for his son's murder.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: One of the gang makes the ultimate sacrifice in a bid to reach Scylla, while, with Wyatt captured, Mahone reaps revenge for his son's murder.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: One of the gang makes the ultimate sacrifice in a bid to reach Scylla, while, with Wyatt captured, Mahone reaps revenge for his son's murder.

includedAssets.title: The Legend
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael collapses and is rushed to hospital, Sucre's life hangs in the balance when he steps on a landmine, and the gang get one step closer to Scylla.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael collapses and is rushed to hospital, while Sucre's life hangs in the balance when he steps on a landmine.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael collapses and is rushed to hospital, Sucre's life hangs in the balance when he steps on a landmine, and the gang get one step closer to Scylla.

includedAssets.title: Quiet Riot
includedAssets.synopsis: The team execute their elaborate plan to steal Scylla, but success hinges on Michael's increasingly ailing health. Pressure-cooker drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The team execute their elaborate plan to steal Scylla, but success hinges on Michael's increasingly ailing health. Pressure-cooker drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The team execute their elaborate plan to steal Scylla, but success hinges on Michael's increasingly ailing health. Pressure-cooker drama.

includedAssets.title: Selfless
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael and co pull off the heist and get their hands on the holy grail of their mission: Scylla. Can they bring the Company down or is there a sting in this tale?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael and co pull off the heist and get their hands on the holy grail of their mission: Scylla.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael and co pull off the heist and get their hands on the holy grail of their mission: Scylla. Can they bring the Company down or is there a sting in this tale?

includedAssets.title: Deal Or No Deal
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep13 - Deal Or No Deal
includedAssets.synopsis: Devious Don sets up the gang and blackmails Gretchen into finding him a buyer for Scylla. There's a slight problem, however: a segment of Scylla is missing.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Devious Don sets up the gang and blackmails Gretchen into finding him a buyer for Scylla.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Devious Don sets up the gang and blackmails Gretchen into finding him a buyer for Scylla. There's a slight problem, however: a segment of Scylla is missing.

includedAssets.title: Just Business
includedAssets.synopsis: In the televisual equivalent of a rollercoaster ride, the deadly tug of war over Scylla intensifies, culminating in Michael falling into Company hands.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The deadly tug of war over Scylla intensifies, culminating in Michael falling into Company hands.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In the televisual equivalent of a rollercoaster ride, the deadly tug of war over Scylla intensifies, culminating in Michael falling into Company hands.

includedAssets.title: Going Under
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael enters surgery, Linc and Sucre race against the clock to retrieve the Holy Grail of their mission and Scylla's game-changing secret is revealed.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael enters surgery and Linc and Sucre race against the clock to retrieve the Holy Grail of their mission.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael enters surgery, Linc and Sucre race against the clock to retrieve the Holy Grail of their mission and Scylla's game-changing secret is revealed.

includedAssets.title: The Sunshine State
includedAssets.synopsis: Scylla continues to be elusive and Michael is rocked by revelations about his mother.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Scylla continues to be elusive and Michael is rocked by revelations about his mother.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Scylla continues to be elusive and Michael is rocked by revelations about his mother.

includedAssets.title: The Mother Lode
includedAssets.synopsis: The pressure cooker drama returns with more action and gasp-worthy plot twists. Christina tells Lincoln of her plans to take over the Company.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The pressure cooker drama returns with more action and gasp-worthy plot twists. Christina tells Lincoln of her plans to take over the Company.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The pressure cooker drama returns with more action and gasp-worthy plot twists. Christina tells Lincoln of her plans to take over the Company.

includedAssets.title: Versus
includedAssets.synopsis: The serial thriller continues to provide pleasingly preposterous twists. Michael and Lincoln square off over Scylla, and Christina sets the cogs of her plan in motion.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael and Lincoln square off over Scylla, and Christina sets the cogs of her plan in motion.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The serial thriller continues to provide pleasingly preposterous twists. Michael and Lincoln square off over Scylla, and Christina sets the cogs of her plan in motion.

includedAssets.title: S.O.B
includedAssets.synopsis: The heart-pumping drama continues. Michael is reunited with Christina, who drops a bombshell regarding Lincoln.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The heart-pumping drama continues. Michael is reunited with Christina, who drops a bombshell regarding Lincoln.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The heart-pumping drama continues. Michael is reunited with Christina, who drops a bombshell regarding Lincoln.

includedAssets.title: Cowboys And Indians
includedAssets.synopsis: While Christina puts the final pieces of her plan together, Michael must make a decision that has deadly consequences.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Christina puts the final pieces of her plan together, Michael must make a decision that has deadly consequences.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Christina puts the final pieces of her plan together, Michael must make a decision that has deadly consequences.

includedAssets.title: Rate Of Exchange
includedAssets.synopsis: A host of familiar faces return to help Michael in his quest to bring down the Company once and for all.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A host of familiar faces return to help Michael in his quest to bring down the Company once and for all.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A host of familiar faces return to help Michael in his quest to bring down the Company once and for all.

includedAssets.title: Killing Your Number
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael and co make one last bid to bring down the Company. Will they succeed?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael and co make one last bid to bring down the Company. Will they succeed?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael and co make one last bid to bring down the Company. Will they succeed?

includedAssets.title: The Old Ball and Chain
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep23 - The Old Ball and Chain
includedAssets.synopsis: In the first of a two-part swansong, Michael and Sara wed. Happiness is short-lived when the latter is arrested for the murder of Christina Scofield.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In the first of a two-part swansong, Michael and Sara wed. Happiness is short-lived when the latter is arrested for a murder.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In the first of a two-part swansong, Michael and Sara wed. Happiness is short-lived when the latter is arrested for the murder of Christina Scofield.

includedAssets.title: Free
includedAssets.synopsis: In the final episode, Michael, Lincoln and co reunite to break out an increasingly vulnerable Sara.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In the final episode, Michael, Lincoln and co reunite to break out an increasingly vulnerable Sara.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In the final episode, Michael, Lincoln and co reunite to break out an increasingly vulnerable Sara.

includedAssets.title: Season 4
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael goes to extreme lengths to finally bring down The Company and earn his freedom. Season four of the smash-hit drama, filled with thrilling twists and turns. Wentworth Miller, Dominic Purcell and William Fichtner star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael goes to extreme lengths to finally bring down The Company and earn his freedom. Season four of the smash-hit drama starring Wentworth Miller.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael goes to extreme lengths to finally bring down The Company and earn his freedom. Season four of the smash-hit drama, filled with thrilling twists and turns. Wentworth Miller, Dominic Purcell and William Fichtner star.

includedIn.title: Prison Break
includedIn.synopsis: A structural engineer gets himself thrown in jail so he can execute an audacious plan to free his incarcerated brother.

includedIn.mediumSynopsis: A structural engineer gets himself thrown in jail so he can execute an audacious plan to free his incarcerated brother.
